text:
*SuperMoney is hiring a Content Brief Creator*

This is a freelance/contract gig.

*About this role:* Looking for someone with SEO experience (KW research especially) to research content briefs for our writers.  Got several hundred to create on various topics.

*To apply, email:* <mailto:ybendiks@supermoney.com|ybendiks@supermoney.com>

<@U01LEHMQ7K8>

set the channel description: HELLO THERE! To post a job, please start here: <https://superpath.co/blog/slack-jobs> It costs $49/listing to post in this channel. All listings will be posted by our job bot and other posts will be removed (very politely). Thank you!
